test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryPlus-1
test-case.description: No unary operator is available for xs:string.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryPlus-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(+3) eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryPlus-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(+3) eq +3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryPlus-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(+3) eq +(3)`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryPlus-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `+(3) eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryPlus-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `+(3) eq +3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryPlus-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `-(3) ne 3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryPlus-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `----------3 eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryPlus-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `+++++++++++3 eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryPlus-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-3 eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryPlus-12
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `+++3 eq ++3`.

test-case.name: K2-NumericUnaryPlus-1
test-case.description: Unary combined with path expressions.

test-case.name: K2-NumericUnaryPlus-2
test-case.description: Unary with an empty sequence.

test-case.name: op-numeric-unary-plus-1
test-case.description: Check dynamic type of unary plus on argument of union of numeric types and untypedAtomic.
test-case.test: for $x in (1, xs:decimal(2), xs:float(3), xs:double(4), xs:untypedAtomic(5)) return typeswitch (+$x) case xs:integer return "integer" case xs:decimal return "decimal" case xs:float return "float" case xs:double return "double" default return error()

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-unary-plus-001
test-case.description: Test unary plus with a potential type check error
test-case.test: declare function local:value($number as xs:boolean) { if ($number) then 1 else xs:string('1') }; +(local:value(true()))
